items.sentence: You\'ll probably find walking through that part of town interesting.
Tom has done things he doesn\'t want his children to find out about.
Tom hasn\'t been back to Boston since he graduated from high school.
Tom knew he didn\'t need to do what Mary told him needed to be done.
The blood alcohol limit for drunken driving is .08 percent in Texas.
Tom and Mary walked from early morning until it started to get dark.
Tom assured me that he would be here in time for the opening speech.
What makes you so sure Tom doesn\'t want to play basketball with us?
Tom and Mary fight more and more. I\'m afraid the honeymoon is over.
Tom can\'t deny the fact that he did what Mary accused him of doing.
